items.sentence: Tom took his glasses out of his pocket and put them on.
Tom certainly is aware of what happened here yesterday.
If you\'ve got a problem, I\'d like to know what it is.
Tom usually wears sunglasses even when it\'s not sunny.
Tom decided that it wasn\'t necessary to take vitamins.
Tom didn\'t even look at the report that Mary gave him.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary had decided to quit her job.
Tom didn\'t want to bother Mary while she was studying.
It\'s been a while since I\'ve done anything like this.
I\'m planning to read as many books as I can this year.
